argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat1rhmval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | mat1rhmval.a | |- A = ( { E } Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | mat1rhmval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | mat1rhmval.o | |- O = <. E , E >. |
| 5 |  | mat1rhmval.f | |- F = ( x e. K |-> { <. O , x >. } ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 7 |  | #P_snfi | |- { E } e. Fin |
| 8 | 2 | #P_matring | |- ( ( { E } e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 9 | 7, 6, 8 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_jca | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> ( R e. Ring /\ A e. Ring ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mat1ghm | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom A ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` A ) = ( mulGrp ` A ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 12, 13 | #P_mat1mhm | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` A ) ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_jca | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> ( F e. ( R GrpHom A ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 13 | #P_isrhm | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom A ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ A e. Ring ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom A ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 15, 16 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V ) -> F e. ( R RingHom A ) ) |
